    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Parameters:
        x - double value of the starting x coordinate of the rectangle
        y - double value of the starting y coordinate of the rectangle
        width - double value of the width of the rectangle
        height - double value of the height of the rectangle
